mapper.insert: insert into payment_list (payment_no, user_no, p_no, p_title, origin_price, discount_price, coupon_no, point_price, pay_way, payment_date, save_point) values (#{payment_no}, (select user_no from UserMember where user_id= #{id}), (select goods_no from goods where goods_price = #{vo2.real_payment}), (select goods_name from goods where goods_price = #{vo2.real_payment}), #{vo2.origin_price}, #{vo2.discount_price}, #{vo2.coupon_no}, #{vo2.point_price}, #{vo2.pay_way}, sysdate, #{vo2.save_point})

insert into payment (payment_no, user_no, lo_no, goods_no, discount, use_point, payment_method, total_payment, payment_date) values (#{payment_no}, (select user_no from UserMember where user_id= #{id}), (select lo_no from UserMember where user_id= #{id}), #{vo2.ticket}, #{vo2.discount}, #{vo2.use_point}, #{vo2.pay_way}, #{vo2.total_payment}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update usermember set reserve_cnt = reserve_cnt + (select reserv_cnt from goods where goods_no = #{vo2.ticket}) where user_id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from coupon_join where user_no = (select user_no from UserMember where user_id= #{id}) and coupon_no = #{coupon_no}
mapper.update: update usermember set point = #{save_point} where user_id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from payment_list where user_no = (select user_no from usermember where user_id= #{id}) order by payment_no desc
mapper.update: update usermember set point = to_number(point) - to_number((select save_point from payment_list where payment_no = #{pay_no})) where user_id = #{id}
